idea-plugin.name: One Dark Theme
idea-plugin.description:
One Dark Theme for JetBrains IDEs

The iconic One Dark color scheme from Atom, now with 60+ Windows Terminal color schemes!

Features

  • Classic One Dark Themes: Regular, Italic, Vivid, and Vivid Italic variants
  • 60+ Windows Terminal Themes: Popular schemes including Dracula, Nord, Tokyo Night, Gruvbox, Catppuccin, and more
  • Full ANSI Color Support: All 16 console colors perfectly mapped
  • Intelligent Syntax Highlighting: Automatic color inference for 100+ language attributes
  • Consistent Colors: Match your terminal and IDE for a unified experience
  • Accessibility Focused: All themes audited for WCAG AA compliance
  • Custom Scheme Support: Import your own Windows Terminal color schemes

Popular Included Themes

  • Dark: Dracula, Nord, Tokyo Night, Gruvbox Dark, Catppuccin Mocha, GitHub Dark, Material, Monokai, Solarized Dark
  • Light: Solarized Light, Gruvbox Light, Ayu Light, Atom One Light

What's New in 6.0.0

  • 60 new Windows Terminal color schemes
  • 60-70% faster build performance
  • WCAG AA accessibility audit
  • Comprehensive documentation
  • 100% backward compatible

See the GitHub repository for documentation, screenshots, and contribution guidelines.
idea-plugin.change-notes:

  • Accessibility: All themes audited for WCAG AA compliance
  • Documentation: Comprehensive guides including migration, color mapping, and contributing

See CHANGELOG.md for complete release notes.
